resources.string: Current and New password cannot be same

string-array.name: string_notification_title
string-array.item: When a comment is made on a referral
When a comment is made on a message
When you receive an event invitation
When a comment is made on a event

string-array.name: string_notification_description
string-array.item: Notifies you that another user has sent you a referral and includes details
Notifies you that the other party has commented on a referral you sent or received
Notifies you that another user has sent you a message and includes details
Notifies you that the other party has commented on a message you sent or received
Notifies you that another user has sent you an event invitation and includes details
Notifies you that the other party has commented on a calendar event you sent or received
